Posts.Content: Hi my name is Debbie and was told I have DCis on 22 nd may after having a needle biopsey and then a cone biopsey one area is 60mm and also have in a other area so surgeon said wle and then rt  or mx i decided straight away that I felt mx as I have had 2 lumps removed from same breast both were non-benign 25 years ago so felt that was the right decision for me, booked in for 11th July but i have got to have snb as well   did u have this? and did u have reconstruction  and also how did it all go for you I am so stressed and sacred . thks
Posts.Title: I just don't understand

Posts.Content: Hi Alison, Glad you are well and thks for the advice I have so many questions still but I guess this is the same for everyone take care
